fields.name: Message
fields.description: An error message explaining the Reason value in more detail.

fields.name: NameAvailable
fields.description: A boolean value that indicates whether the name is available for you to use. If true, the name is available. If false, the name has already been taken or is invalid and cannot be used.

fields.name: Reason
fields.description: The reason that a vault name could not be used. The Reason element is only returned if NameAvailable is false.
